game.name: Gem Brawl Duel
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A gem war testing reflexes, strategy, and hauling! On shared screen, precious gems rain down as you battle for territory. Drag gems to your camp to score, disrupt rivals, and fight for supremacy. Every gem can change the battle!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A gem war testing reflexes, strategy, and hauling! On shared screen, precious gems rain down as you battle for territory. Drag gems to your camp to score, disrupt rivals, and fight for supremacy. Every gem can change the battle!
